mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, deleted, username, password, nickname, real_name, gender, avatar, email, phone, birthday, status, type, dept_id, login_ip, login_time, description, create_user_id
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as userId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.code) as roleCodes, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.permission) as permissionCodes FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.status = 1 AND r.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id AND m.status = 1 AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.permission IS NOT NULL AND m.permission != '' WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1 AND u.deleted = 0 GROUP BY u.id

SELECT m.id, m.parent_id as parentId, m.path, m.component, m.redirect, m.type, m.title, m.svg_icon as svgIcon, m.icon, m.keep_alive as keepAlive, m.hidden, m.sort, m.active_menu as activeMenu, m.breadcrumb, m.status, m.permission, m.show_in_tabs as showInTabs, m.always_show as alwaysShow, m.affix, m.create_time as createTime, m.update_time as updateTime, m.deleted, m.create_user_id as createUserId, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r2.code) as roleCodes FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id AND r.status = 1 AND r.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id AND u.status = 1 AND u.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm2 ON m.id = rm2.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r2 ON rm2.role_id = r2.id AND r2.status = 1 AND r2.deleted = 0 WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.type IN (1, 2) -- 1:目录 2:菜单 (排除按钮类型3) GROUP BY m.id, m.parent_id, m.path, m.component, m.redirect, m.type, m.title, m.svg_icon, m.icon, m.keep_alive, m.hidden, m.sort, m.active_menu, m.breadcrumb, m.status, m.permission, m.show_in_tabs, m.always_show, m.affix, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.deleted, m.create_user_id ORDER BY m.sort ASC, m.id ASC
